name: GiantDungeon
description:
Story

You are kidnaped by giants. You escaped from the dungeon but you have to destroy magic cubes to open main door.

Controls

W, A, S, D and space for movement and Left Mouse Click to shoot.

How to Play

Try to find and destroy all of magic cubes before your time is up.

Other Information

This short game made for Game 301 Course's final assignment. This game is my first game with UE4

Gameplay Video
